titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Sheelah Green-Wilkinson World War I scrapbook album, 1916-1918 MS 202

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored onsite at the Woodson Research Center.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-04-01 19:08:43 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.unittitle: Sheelah Green-Wilkinson World War I scrapbook album
did.abstract: This collection consists of an album that contains 48 items from World War I, mainly Christmas cards issued by regiments. Also included are a few postcards, a German shoulder-strap, and a leaf of laurel.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of an album that contains 48 items from World War I, mainly Christmas cards issued by regiments. Also included are a few postcards, a German shoulder-strap, and a leaf of laurel picked outside of Cloth Hall, Ypres, January 12, 1918.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Stored onsite at the Woodson Research Center.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Sheelah Green-Wilkinson album must be obtained from the Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased from Walford on November 14, 1962.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Sheelah Green-Wilkinson album, 1916-1918, MS 202, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University

did.unittitle: Scrapbook containing 48 items from World War I, mainly Christmas cards issued by regiments. Also included are a few postcards, a German shoulder-strap, and a leaf of laurel.
